title: Momentum - Finding momentum position vs time graph

content.question: Two blocks move on a straight, level track, where friction between the blocks and the track is negligible. Block <math alttext="B" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi></math> of mass <math alttext="4.0 kilograms" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>4.0</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mi>kg</mi></math> is initially at rest. Block <math alttext="A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi></math> of mass <math alttext="2.0 kilograms" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>2.0</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mi>kg</mi></math> slides to the right and collides with Block <math alttext="B" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi></math> at time <math alttext="t equals 3 seconds" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>t</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>3</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi></math>.
